short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat YES is mainly Facebook and Instagram based marketing application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat YES is All-in-one Digital Marketing Platform
Chat YES is mainly Facebook and Instagram based marketing application. Therefore, after Completing Facebook API Settings Properly, you have to import your Facebook and Instagram accounts to Chat YES. Importing Facebook and Instagram accounts into Chat YES is easy and straightforward. Just follow the instructions, and you can import Facebook and Instagram accounts in no time.

Revolutionary, world`s very first, and complete marketing software for Facebook & other social medias developed using official APIs.

Features
✅ Messenger chatbot
Setup messenger bot for replying 24/7 with visual flow builder.

✅ Live chat
Live chat with Facebook/Instagram subscribers

✅ Comment reply
Template, hide/delete offensive comment, keyword based reply, generic reply to Facebook pages posts comment.

✅ Social poster
Instant/schedule posting on social medias.
